Package ch.linetic.gui.component

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Drawable
    A Drawable is an entity of the GUI that can be display by calling the function draw()
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnalyzerComponent
    Component of the GUI that display the result of an Analyzer
    AnalyzerGridComponent
    Implementation of the class GridComponent used for displaying a grid of the result of all Analyzers present in a given AnalyzerManager
    Component
    A component if an entity of the GUI It is drawable (therefore implements Drawable) and has a position and a size
    GridComponent
    A GridComponent is a component that act as a grid for other components i.e.
    UserListBox
    Extension of the class ListBox from the library "controlP5" used for displaying a real time list of all user recognized by the kinect at any moment
